SELECT so.id, so.code, so.price, so.order_status AS orderStatus, so.create_date AS createDate, so.update_date AS updateDate, si.scenic_name AS scenicName, si.web_img AS webImg, si.area, si.scenic_price AS scenicPrice, si.point, si.hot, si.history, si.link, si.address, si.level, si.sold, ui.code AS userCode, ui.name AS userName, ui.email, ui.phone, ui.avatar FROM scenic_order so LEFT JOIN scenic_info si ON ( si.id = so.scenic_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = so.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scenicOrder.userName},'%')
AND si.scenic_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scenicOrder.scenicName},'%')
AND so.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scenicOrder.code},'%')
AND so.order_status = #{scenicOrder.orderStatus}
ORDER BY so.create_date DESC
